title: Hotels plan to make room in Bihar, Odisha
description: More hoteliers could expand in Bihar and Odisha as budget proposals encouraged tourism development. Indian Hotels Company and Radisson have already launched new projects in the region, citing growing opportunities. Hotel chains are aligning with government initiatives, which aim to improve infrastructure and attract tourists. The hospitality industry anticipates further growth with enhanced connectivity and upgraded pilgrimage sites.
